verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> and <S%G2298>marvelous,<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> [which are] the <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> in them the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5055>finished.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw,<s%> as it were, a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3396>mixed<s%> with <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who had <S%G3528>come<s%> <S%G3528>off<s%> <S%G3528>victorious<s%> from the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and from his <S%G1504>image<s%> and from the <S%G706>number<s%> of his <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass,<s%> <S%G2192>holding<s%> <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And they <S%G103>sang<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> the bond-servant of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G5603>song<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>"Great<s%> and <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> are Thy <S%G2041>works,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty;<s%> <S%G1342>Righteous<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> are Thy <S%G3598>ways,<s%> Thou <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

<S%G5101>"Who<s%> will not <S%G5399>fear,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name<s%>? For Thou <S%G3441>alone<s%> art <S%G3741>holy;<s%> For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> Thee, For Thy <S%G1345>righteous<s%> <S%G1345>acts<s%> have been <S%G5319>revealed.<s%>"

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of <S%G3142>testimony<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%>

and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> in <S%G3043>linen,<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> [and] <S%G2986>bright,<s%> and <S%G4024>girded<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> their <S%G4738>breasts<s%> with <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>girdles.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G1072>filled<s%> with <S%G2586>smoke<s%> from the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and from His <S%G1411>power;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G5055>finished.<s%>
